name: Accidently Great Gradients

All random or a little fiddle?


The plugin works by using the HSL scale. If you feeling blue, use the blue hues. Or no, maybe bring the lightness up, and set the saturation to vivid. Or just go all random.


Great things can come from accidents, just think of Penicillin â€“ now it's easier than ever to incorporate it in you design, with the Accidently Great Gradients Figma plugin.
